summary: Client requested Jordan to run tests. QA confirmed the test passed and output matches expected ('ready to go'); PM, Architect, and Developer provided no comments (not addressed).

decisions.title: QA test passed
decisions.details: QA confirmed the output matches expected and indicated the item is ready to go; no other stakeholders provided comments during this discussion.

sign_offs.what: Confirmed test passed; output matches expected: 'ready to go'

actions.task: Execute the requested tests and report results
Provide comments or explicit approval regarding release readiness (was not addressed)
Provide architecture sign-off or raise concerns (was not addressed)
Confirm code readiness or address outstanding issues (was not addressed)

backlog_deltas.title: Mark test status as passed and item as ready to go based on QA confirmation

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (PM, Architect, Developer) did not provide comments and the item may not be fully addressed or visible to them.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with PM, Architect, and Developer to obtain explicit confirmation or sign-off before proceeding to release.
